problem.markdown:
Suppose 4 r = 3 s = 10 t, where r, s, and t are positive integers. What is the sum of the least values of r, s, and t for which this equality is true?

= 41 [explanation] The values of r,s and t can be found by dividing the LCM of the coeficients by the respective coefficients.
